name: Lisa M. BOWSER, Petitioner, v. Johannes V. BLOM, Respondent

parties: Lisa M. BOWSER, Petitioner, v. Johannes V. BLOM, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this day of 21st day of May, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED to the following issue:
Whether the Superior Court erred in affirming the trial court’s order denying counsel fees.
Furthermore, the Application under Pa.R.A.P.1926 is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
772 A.2d 415
Lisa M. BOWSER, Petitioner, v. Johannes V. BLOM, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 21, 2001.
